long_desc.thetext: it'd be very useful to update consul package. since it's currently 0.6.0 while your package is still 0.1 which is more than a year old.

Running check of dependencies for 0.6.0 46499d6e7237ca8547c15ce44e9b93bea48a455b commit
consul-464...]$ gofed check-deps deps/v0-6-0.json import path github.com/DataDog/datadog-go/statsd not found package golang-github-armon-circbuf outdated package golang-github-armon-go-metrics outdated package golang-github-armon-go-radix outdated package golang-github-boltdb-bolt outdated package golang-github-fsouza-go-dockerclient outdated import path github.com/hashicorp/errwrap not found package golang-github-hashicorp-go-checkpoint outdated import path github.com/hashicorp/go-cleanhttp not found import path github.com/hashicorp/go-immutable-radix not found import path github.com/hashicorp/go-memdb not found package golang-github-hashicorp-go-msgpack outdated package golang-github-hashicorp-go-multierror outdated package golang-github-hashicorp-golang-lru outdated package golang-github-hashicorp-hcl outdated package golang-github-hashicorp-logutils outdated package golang-github-hashicorp-memberlist outdated package golang-github-hashicorp-net-rpc-msgpackrpc outdated package golang-github-hashicorp-raft outdated package golang-github-hashicorp-scada-client outdated import path github.com/hashicorp/serf/coordinate not found import path github.com/hashicorp/serf/serf not found package golang-github-hashicorp-yamux outdated package golang-github-miekg-dns outdated import path github.com/mitchellh/cli not found package golang-github-mitchellh-mapstructure outdated package golang-github-ryanuber-columnize outdated package golang-googlecode-go-crypto not found in golang.repos
- 19 packages are outdated - about 5 new packages
This package has changed ownership in the Fedora Package Database. Reassigning to the new owner of this component.
Looking forward to this, if I can help in any way please let me know.

> Looking forward to this, if I can help in any way please let me know.
Can you test it? I have update the summary. For the latest release 0.6.3 let's open new issue if needed.
[1] http://koji.fedoraproject.org/koji/buildinfo?buildID=736246
